page.title: 02OUR AREA 2
page.content: THE COUNTRYSIDE COULD BE DESCRIBED AS GENTLY UNDULATING.MANY OF THE HEDGEROWS HAVE BEEN REMOVED IN ORDER TO INCREASE THE EFFICENCY OF THE FARMING OPERATION. THE AREA HAS FEW AMENITIES.RESIDENTS OF THE AREA RELY ON{ATTLEBOROUGH}OR {WATTON}TO SUPPLY THEIR EVERYDAY NEEDS AND USE THE CITY OF{NORWICH}FOR MAJOR SHOPPING OR ENTERTAINMENT. THE BUS SERVICE INTO ATTLEBOROUGH RUNS ONCE A DAY AND APART FROM THIS THERE IS NO OTHER MEANS OF PUBLIC TRANSPORT.PEOPLE IN THE AREA THUS RELY HEAVILY ON THE USE OF CARS. THE NEAREST HEALTH CENTRE,DENTISTS ETC ARE IN ATTLEBOROUGH. THERE ARE TWO LOCAL PRIMARY SCHOOLS AT {ROCKLANDS}AND{GT. ELLINGHAM}AND THE HIGH SCHOOL IS AT{ATTLEBOROUGH}OR {WATTON.
